sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form-donacion', templateUrl: './form-donacion.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form-donacion.component.scss'] }) export class FormDonacionComponent { patternDni = '^[0-9]{8}[A-Z]$'; dni: string = ""; nombre: string = ""; pago: string = ""; onSubmit(form: any) { console.log(form.value); } } -->
